member.name: T:jjm.one.MiscUtilClasses.Types.basic.AppInfo
member.summary: This class is a wrapper for basic information about an application.

member.name: P:jjm.one.MiscUtilClasses.Types.basic.AppInfo.AppBuildDate
member.summary: The build date of the app.

member.name: P:jjm.one.MiscUtilClasses.Types.basic.AppInfo.AppBuildTime
member.summary: The build time of the app.

member.name: P:jjm.one.MiscUtilClasses.Types.basic.AppInfo.AppRuntimeEnvironment
member.summary: The runtime environment in which the app was started.

member.name: M:jjm.one.MiscUtilClasses.Types.basic.AppInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A additional constructor for the class.

member.name: M:jjm.one.MiscUtilClasses.Types.basic.AppInfo.ToString
member.summary: Converts the information of the object into a human readable string. The following pattern gets used: {AppName} [Version: {AppVersion} - {AppBuildDate} @ {AppBuildTime} | Env: {AppRuntimeEnvironment}]
member.returns: A containing the infromation of the object.
